duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct timely evaluation and initial treatment of Emergency Department patients in psychiatric crisis.
Develop care plans in collaboration with the on-call Psychiatrist and Emergency Department staff.
Ensure customer satisfaction, maintain patient confidentiality and sensitivity to age-specific patient needs.
Assess patients in acute crisis situations due to mental health and/or addictions.
Work with Emergency Department and behavioral health providers to develop a care plan for appropriate patient disposition.
Participate in professional development opportunities and regular engagement with Department Medical Director & Administrator.

education_certification.credential: Master’s Degree in Social Work. State licensure required (LCSW). One or more years’ experience providing crisis intervention services in a behavioral health setting.
